com.mapdigit.licence
Class LicenceManager

java.lang.Object
  com.mapdigit.licence.LicenceManager

public final class LicenceManager
extends java.lang.Object

LicenceManager managers all guidebee product licences.

© Copyright 2007 Guidebee, Inc. All Rights Reserved.

getInstance

public static LicenceManager getInstance()
                                  throws InvalidLicenceException
Get an instance of the LicenceManager. The licence file must be put in the resource of the MIDlet with given name guidebee.lic.

Returns:
a licence manager instance.
Throws:
InvalidLicenceException

queryLicence

public boolean queryLicence(java.lang.String appName)
Query give product has valid licence or not.

Parameters:
appName - product name of guidebee, case sensitive.
Returns:
true the product has valid licence ,otherwise invalid.
